scripts.pretest: rm -f .sonar/issues-report/issues-report.html; if ! (sonar.sh status); then sonar.sh start; fi
scripts.test: jshint app/player && jshint test && istanbul cover -- mocha -t 5000 test/**/*-test.js && mocha -t 5000 test/integration-test-runner.js && sonar-runner -Dsonar.analysis.mode=preview -Dsonar.issuesReport.console.enable=true -Dsonar.issuesReport.html.enable=true
